Package org.apache.wayang.core.plan.wayangplan

Class Subplan

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.wayang.core.plan.wayangplan.OperatorBase
      • org.apache.wayang.core.plan.wayangplan.Subplan
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, ActualOperator, CompositeOperator, Operator, OperatorContainer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LoopSubplan
    public class Subplan
extends OperatorBase
implements ActualOperator, CompositeOperator, OperatorContainer
    A subplan encapsulates connected operators as a single operator.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Subplan

        protected Subplan​(java.util.List<InputSlot<?>> inputs,
                  java.util.List<OutputSlot<?>> outputs)
        Creates a new instance with the given operators. Initializes the InputSlots and OutputSlots, steals existing connections, initializes the slotMapping, and sets as inner Operators' parent.
        See Also:
        wrap(Operator, Operator), wrap(List, List, OperatorContainer)

    • Method Detail

      • wrap

        public static Operator wrap​(Operator inputOperator,
                            Operator outputOperator)
        Wrap the given operators in a new instance (unless its a single operator), thereby redirecting cut off connections through this subplan.

                           java.util.List<OutputSlot<?>> outputs,
                           OperatorContainer container)
        Creates a new instance with the given operators. Initializes the InputSlots and OutputSlots, steals existing connections, initializes the slotMapping, and sets as inner Operators' parent.
